Shipping fee

USA excluded Alaska and Hawaii

For products like projectors, screens and accessories, it is free standard shipment and the delivery time is  3-4 business days after the order is processed.

For products like Smart cabinet and  Vanish Rollable Laser TV, the shipping fee is from $150-$500 depending on the size and the style. The delivery time is 90 days after the order is processed.

Other US states, territories, and other countries

Canada: $150 for standard shipping and delivery time is 6-10 business days.

the latest optimized lenticular material
(HBSP) based on CBSP material for higher
contrast, achieving an extra 20% gain increase
than the regular CBSP ALR screens on
the market.

settings.image_alt: Comparison showing 0.6 dB peak gain of AWOL Vision Cinematic ALR Screen vs matte white screen.
settings.image_alt_mobile: AWOL Vision Cinematic ALR Screen demonstrating 0.6 dB peak gain against ambient light.
settings.context:
Unlike a typical matte white screen, which
scatters light in all directions, the AWOL
Vision ALR screen features a 0.6 dB peak gain.
This makes it perfect for Ultra Short Throw
(UST) projection, eliminating hot spots and
effectively countering ambient light.
